Package parser

Class SceneDescriptor

java.lang.Object
parser.SceneDescriptor
public class SceneDescriptor extends Object
SceneDescriptor class helps with parsing XML files and initializing the scene's attributes, lights, spheres, and triangles. It stores the data from the XML document in its fields for further usage in the scene creation process. Authors: Noga Jacobs and Noa

      public SceneDescriptor(Map<String,String> sceneAttributes, Map<String,String> ambientLightAttributes, List<Map<String,String>> spheres, List<Map<String,String>> triangles)
      Constructor for SceneDescriptor with provided parameters for scene attributes, ambient light attributes, spheres, and triangles.
      Parameters:
      sceneAttributes - Map representing the scene attributes.
      ambientLightAttributes - Map representing the ambient light attributes.
      spheres - List of maps representing the spheres in the scene.
      triangles - List of maps representing the triangles in the scene.

    • InitializeFromXMLstring

      public SceneDescriptor InitializeFromXMLstring(Document document)
      Initialize the SceneDescriptor from an XML Document. Parses the XML data and populates the SceneDescriptor fields accordingly.
      Parameters:
      document - The XML Document containing the scene data.
      Returns:
      SceneDescriptor object initialized with the data from the XML Document.
